subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gerald Wallace had 25 points and 16 rebounds and the Charlotte Bobcats frustrated Denver in a 107-95 victory that snapped the visiting Nuggets’ four-game winning streak.
snippet: Gerald Wallace had 25 points and 16 rebounds and the Charlotte Bobcats frustrated Denver in a 107-95 victory that snapped the visiting Nuggets’ four-game winning streak.
